content:
That's wonderful! It's great to hear that you had a fun family game night, and congratulations to your 10-year-old niece on her win! Scattergories is a fantastic game for families, and it's excellent that she was able to hold her own against the adults.

It's not uncommon for kids to surprise us with their creativity and thinking skills, especially in games that require wordplay and imagination. Scattergories is a great way to encourage kids to think outside the box and develop their language skills.

I'm sure you must be proud of her, and it's wonderful that you're creating these fun memories with your family. Gaming with kids can be a great way to bond and spend quality time together, and it's fantastic that you're making it a regular part of your family activities.

How did your niece react to winning, and did she have a favorite category or topic in the game?
